spring.000: The books here are very interesting.. You should read them.
spring.004: Sunsets are really pretty, don't you think so too?
spring.005: The raindrop I chose won the raindrop race today.#$b#Do you do this too when it rains?$h
summer.001: Cold strawberry milkshake on a summer night just hits it for me!
summer.002: So hot... I need ice cream...
summer.003: Careful!#$b#You almost stepped on the little sandcastle that I built!
summer.004: Honestly I'm here mostly for the air conditioning, hehe.
fall.000: Fall is my favourite season.#$b#Don't you think the color of the falling leaves around you look stunning?
fall.001: This broom? Of course I fly with it!
fall.002: Stay still, I'll cast a warmth spell on you.$h
winter.000: I hope the animals aren't too cold in this weather...
winter.001: Brr..#$b#The sky is so dark and the weather's so cold now..
winter.002: Not really a huge fan of coffee but it does warm you up on this cold night.
winter.004: The heater here works great!I can read books comfortably.
